remarks: Every solution of the equation ` A * X = B ` for matrices ` A ` and ` B ` is a matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Feb-2019.)
statement:
mamudm.e $e |- E = ( R freeLMod ( M X. N ) ) $.
mamudm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` E ) $.
mamudm.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod ( N X. P ) ) $.
mamudm.c $e |- C = ( Base ` F ) $.
mamudm.m $e |- .X. = ( R maMul <. M , N , P >. ) $.
mamufacex.g $e |- G = ( R freeLMod ( M X. P ) ) $.
mamufacex.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
mamufacex $p |- ( ( ( M =/= (/) /\ P =/= (/) ) /\ ( R e. V /\ Y e. D ) /\ ( M e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ P e. Fin ) ) -> ( ( X .X. Z ) = Y -> Z e. C ) ) $.
